short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time while learning more with less stress

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features

  - Provides immediate feedback on correctness
  - Auto complete using buttons or hotkeys
  - Indicates when the task is safe to check
  - Supports all non speaking challenge types
  - Enable / disable hinting by challenge type

Options

  - Typing : Enable hints for typing exercises
  - Wordbank : Enable hints for wordbank exercises
  - Native : Enable hints for translations to native language
  - Select : Enable hints for option selection exercises
  - Confirm : Auto continue exercises after Check button
  - Buttons : Display buttons for auto completion
  - Hotkeys : Enable hotkeys for auto completion

Hotkeys

  Ctrl + RightArrow : Complete next input / character
  Ctrl + Shift + RightArrow : Complete next input / word
  Shift + RightArrow : Submit Check / Continue

Please note that this extension has no affiliation with Duolingo.
